content:
Craft an item of type: red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 4, "index": 14}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 12, "index": 17}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 5, "index": 31}, {"type": "scaffolding", "quantity": 23, "index": 43}, {"type": "green_concrete", "quantity": 33, "index": 45}]

thought: To solve this task I need to craft red_sandstone. Red sandstone requires placing 4 red_sand in the crafting grid, therefore I will first need to move the red_sand from slot 14 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 3, "index": 14}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 12, "index": 17}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 5, "index": 31}, {"type": "scaffolding", "quantity": 23, "index": 43}, {"type": "green_concrete", "quantity": 33, "index": 45}]

thought: Since the red_sand has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move another red_sand to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the red_sand to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 2, "index": 14}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 12, "index": 17}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 5, "index": 31}, {"type": "scaffolding", "quantity": 23, "index": 43}, {"type": "green_concrete", "quantity": 33, "index": 45}]
thought: Since the red_sand has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move another red_sand below it. Slot 4 is below slot 1, and therefore I will move the red_sand to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 12, "index": 17}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 5, "index": 31}, {"type": "scaffolding", "quantity": 23, "index": 43}, {"type": "green_concrete", "quantity": 33, "index": 45}]

thought: Since the red_sand has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move another red_sand to the right of it. Slot 5 is to the right of slot 4, and therefore I will move the red_sand to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 14 to slot 5 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: red_sandstone
inventory=[{"type": "red_sandstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "map", "quantity": 12, "index": 17}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 5, "index": 31}, {"type": "scaffolding", "quantity": 23, "index": 43}, {"type": "green_concrete", "quantity": 33, "index": 45}]
thought: Now I can craft the red_sandstone by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
